definitions.definition: Waves that break on an ocean shoreline .
An instance or session of riding a surfboard in the surf.
examples: We went for a surf this morning.

definitions.definition: A dance popular in the 1960s in which the movements of a surfboard rider are mimicked.

main_definition: Waves that break on an ocean shoreline .
secondary_definitions: An instance or session of riding a surfboard in the surf.
A dance popular in the 1960s in which the movements of a surfboard rider are mimicked.
( UK , dialect ) The bottom of a drain .
